title: The hidden story of inner transformation, Jordan Peterson
description: Integration of the shadow is the core of spiritual transformation - but this has deep roots - clinical psychologist and philosopher Jordan Peterson explains how this is a hidden story of transformation at the heart of our culture.

I've been doing over the last few years
I've done quite a lot of sort of deep
transformational practices a lot of
shadow work so integrating the shadow
and actually feeling that real sense of
